name: Loop Line
description:
Created for the Ludum Dare 47 Jam, with the theme "Stuck in a Loop".

You have a little train on a little loop of track.  Move coal, steel, and water where they're needed, buy new wagons, expand your loop, and keep moving!

Credits:

  • Game design, programming: sprvrn
  • Graphics, music, SFX: Nyeti

Made with löve2d, PICO-8, Aseprite, and the HEPT32 palette.
